name: Cool Lemonade Stand
description:
Your goal is to make as much money as you can in 14 or 30 days by selling lemonade at your lemonade stand, Can you sell $1,000 of lemonade?

Buy cups, lemons, sugar, and ice, then decide your recipe based on the weather and how much cash you want to charge customers. Start with the given basic recipe, then try to change the recipe and see if you can make the recipe better to make more cash. Try to change your lemonade sale price based on the weather conditions. If you get good reviews and have happy customers even more people will shop up to your stand. If you make enough cash you can upgrade your stands location to the Park or the City to sell Lemonade for up to 4x more cash! At the end of the game, you'll see how much money you made.

Compare your scores against all the entrepreneurs in the world, are you in the top 10% of the lemonade market?
